titles.title: To establish within the Smithsonian Institution the National Museum of the American Latino, and for other purposes.
National Museum of the American Latino Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
